summary:
- **Security Issuance**: 200,000 ordinary fully paid shares (ASX: HAR) issued on 11/07/2025.  
- **Purpose**: Partial settlement of a loan (non-cash consideration).  
- **Post-Issuance Capital**: Total ordinary shares on issue: 214,744,956. Unquoted securities include performance rights (7.5M), performance shares (5M), and options (4M expiring 07-Dec-2026, 20M expiring 26-Jun-2028).  
- **Shareholder Approval**: Approved at General Meeting on 11 June 2025.  

**Note**: No new capital raised (non-cash transaction).
